name: Visual Studio Performance Report Data File
summary: Learn about .VSPX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: VSPX files can become very large depending on the resource requirements of an application. Therefore, developers often save analyzed reports (.VSPS files) so they don't have to regenerate the data from the source VSP file again.
NOTE: VSPX files replace .VSP files used by previous versions of Visual Studio.

description: Developer file introduced with Visual Studio 2011; contains application performance metrics collected during a performance analysis test; generated into a report summary, which helps developers identify bottlenecks and optimize performance.
